name: Aldori Artistry
text: You can do more with your blade than slash and stab.
prerequisites: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (Aldori dueling sword), Weapon Finesse, base attack bonus +2.
benefit: Choose one of the following combat maneuvers: disarm, reposition, steal, sunder, or trip. You gain a +2 bonus when performing the selected maneuver while wielding an Aldori dueling sword. This bonus does not stack with the bonus provided by a combat maneuver feat with “improved” in its name (such as Improved Trip).
special: You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different combat maneuver each time.
prerequisites_zh: 异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，BAB+2。
benefit_zh:
选择以下战技之一：卸武，移位、偷盗、破武或摔绊。当你挥舞着奥多里决斗剑进行选择的战技时，你会获得+2加值。这个加值不会与“精通”类的战技专长相叠加（如精通摔绊）。

特别的：你可以多次选择这个专长，每次选择额外选择一项战技。
